<title level="1" pfs="">[Boggard Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2276)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 31

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Boggard Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2276)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Boggard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=209" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 155</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 blowgun_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66) (5 [hunting spider venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=118) darts), [_+1 hide armor_](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 160

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_trident_ +22,
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_blowgun_ +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1 nonlethal piercing plus [hunting spider venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=118)

**Nature's Edge**   Boggard wardens are trained to take advantage of their foes' weak points when they're on unfavorable terrain. Enemies are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the boggard warden if they're in natural difficult terrain.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A boggard warden deals 2d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

**Swamp Stride**   A boggard warrior ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

**Terrifying Croak** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The boggard warrior unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1 unless they succeed at a DC 28 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

**Tongue Grab**   If the boggard warrior hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 24 and dealing at least 10 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

</column>
name: Boggard Warden

text: Boggard Warden Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 31 Unspecific Lore : DC 29 Specific Lore : DC 26 Boggard Warden Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 155 Perception +19; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +19, Intimidation +18, Stealth +19, Survival +17 Str +6 Dex +4 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +4 Cha +3 Items +1 blowgun (5 hunting spider venom darts), +1 hide armor , +1 striking trident --- AC 28 Fort +18 Ref +19 Will +17 HP 160 --- Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride Melee Single Action trident +22, Damage 2d8+9 piercing Melee Single Action tongue +21 (reach 10 feet), Damage tongue grab Ranged Single Action blowgun +20 (Agile), Damage 1 nonlethal piercing plus hunting spider venom Nature's Edge Boggard wardens are trained to take advantage of their foes' weak points when they're on unfavorable terrain. Enemies are flat-footed to the boggard warden if they're in natural difficult terrain. Sneak Attack A boggard warden deals 2d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures. Swamp Stride A boggard warrior ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features. Terrifying Croak Single Action (Auditory, Emotion, Fear, Mental) The boggard warrior unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes frightened 1 unless they succeed at a DC 28 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute. Tongue Grab If the boggard warrior hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes grabbed by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 24 and dealing at least 10 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.
